paper.title: Financial APT-based Gaussian TFA learning for adaptive portfolio management
paper.abstract: Adaptive portfolio management has been studied in the literature of neural nets and machine learning. The recently developed Temporal Factor Analysis (TFA) model mainly targeted for farther study of the Arbitrage Pricing Theory (APT) is found to have potential applications in portfolio management. In this paper, we aim to illustrate the superiority of APT-based portfolio management over return-based portfolio management.

domain_result.justification: 该论文明确讨论了基于APT（套利定价理论）的投资组合管理，并比较了其与基于回报的投资组合管理的优势，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
